name: Prestige Silver Sun
short_description:
A home is your biggest investment in lifetime and you want it to be best. To offer you the best residential option, Prestige Group has launched its new residential project called Prestige Silver Sun. With amazing appearance, great detailed work, excellent use of space, strategic location of Sarjapur Road, Bangalore, Prestige Silver Sun offers you a place where you can hop and leap away from daily office work.

In this modern era, where people are not willing to compromise with either comfort or style, It offers you world class structure in terms of infrastructure and out of the world amenities. This is a unique residential project that consists of major facilities that make your life comfortable and lavish life. The township is located in Sarjapur Road, and offers close proximity to IT belt of Bangalore. Prestige Silver Sun sequence of amazing apartments offers you a choice of 2 and 3 bedroom units. It is spread across 2.5 acres of land and is composed of 102 units.
summary: Prestige Silver Sun is pre launch project put forwards by Prestige Gro
